dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing 2.5 years of weekly data from an online store that spends on both online and offline media channels, including two control variables and a KPI column as the dependent variable.
dcterms:title: Dataset 1

dcterms:description: A dataset representing a business with physical stores, where advertising is done through one online media channel and five offline channels, containing weekly sales as the KPI.
dcterms:title: Dataset 2
